metadata.synopsis: Plaque Narrator AD for a head bust in Gortash's Office
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Gortash office. - Click on the plaque

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Dame Amafrey, the Orphans' Friend, founded several orphanages in the Outer City, as the Lower City was no place for children (and the Upper City declined to sponsor an orphanage).*
